Uses of Package
org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote

  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.api  
    org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.impl  
    org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote
    Interfaces exported by worker classes to the server.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces
    Interfaces to the main worker classes that provide the magical power that drives the webapp front-end.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker
    Implementation of a Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors on the local system.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest.handler
    This package contains type handlers for the RESTful interface to Taverna Server.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker
    A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote used by org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.api 
    Class and Description
    ImplementationException
    Exception that indicates that the implementation has gone wrong in some unexpected way.
    RemoteListener
    An event listener that is attached to a RemoteSingleRun.
    RemoteStatus
    States of a workflow run.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.remote used by org.apache.taverna.server.localworker.impl 
    Class and Description
    IllegalStateTransitionException
    Exception that indicates where a change of a workflow run's status is illegal.
    ImplementationException
    Exception that indicates that the implementation has gone wrong in some unexpected way.
    RemoteDirectory
    Represents a directory that is the working directory of a workflow run, or a sub-directory of it.
    RemoteDirectoryEntry
    An entry in a RemoteDirectory representing a file or sub-directory.
    RemoteFile
    Represents a file in the working directory of a workflow instance run, or in some sub-directory of it.
    RemoteInput
    This represents the assignment of inputs to input ports of the workflow.
    RemoteListener
    An event listener that is attached to a RemoteSingleRun.
    RemoteRunFactory
    The main RMI-enabled interface for creating runs.
    RemoteSecurityContext
    Outline of the security context for a workflow run.
    RemoteSingleRun 
    RemoteStatus
    States of a workflow run.
    StillWorkingOnItException
    Exception that indicates that the implementation is still working on processing the operation.
